text:
When trying to create a new contact form, I ran into a null pointer error. The
result was from createUsecaseDocument.jx using title for the navigation title
field, and
./modules-core/sitemanagement/java/src/org/apache/lenya/cms/site/usecases/Create.java
expecting dublincore.title.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 18953
Changes Navigation Title field name
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 18955
Fixes more NPE, includes the original patch as well.

I found more NPE in the usecase while trying to create a contact form. The
changes model the create.jx usecase in the sitemanagement module.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
nettings@apache.org
text:
applied, thanks!

please verify and close the bug if all is ok.
